languages.text: Whenever Kibellah kills an enemy, she automatically applies the effect of {g|f:3a4eebf212974ba68d6867981c240b1b}blood phial{/g} in a 1-cell radius around that enemy, and her allies with the {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}bloodblessed{/g} effect receive +1 stack of {g|f:bd0b478bdb014d4c9d5b6af8ac877283}disturbed{/g} for 1 round. Kibellah's next successful attack will score a critical hit.

traits.locale_text: If Kibellah kills an enemy, she automatically applies a {g|f:3a4eebf212974ba68d6867981c240b1b}Blood Phial{/g} area behind them. The next attack of Kibellah is an auto crit. Also, her allies with the {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}Bloodblessed{/g} effect receive 1 stack of {g|f:bd0b478bdb014d4c9d5b6af8ac877283}Disturbed{/g} for 1 round when this happens.

Whenever Kibellah kills an enemy, she automatically applies the effect of {g|f:3a4eebf212974ba68d6867981c240b1b}blood phial{/g} in a 1-cell radius around that enemy, and her allies with the {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}bloodblessed{/g} effect receive +1 stack of {g|f:bd0b478bdb014d4c9d5b6af8ac877283}disturbed{/g} for 1 round. Kibellah's next successful attack will score a critical hit.

Whenever Kibellah kills an enemy, she automatically applies the effect of {g|f:3a4eebf212974ba68d6867981c240b1b}blood phial{/g} in a 1-cell radius around that enemy, and her allies with the {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}bloodblessed{/g} effect receive +1 stack of {g|f:bd0b478bdb014d4c9d5b6af8ac877283}disturbed{/g} for 1 round. Kibellah's next successful attack will score a critical hit.

Whenever Kibellah kills an enemy, she automatically applies the effect of {g|f:3a4eebf212974ba68d6867981c240b1b}blood phial{/g} in a 1-cell radius around that enemy, and her allies with the {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}bloodblessed{/g} effect receive +1 stack of {g|f:bd0b478bdb014d4c9d5b6af8ac877283}disturbed{/g} for 1 round. Kibellah's next successful attack will score a critical hit.

Whenever Kibellah kills an enemy, she automatically applies the effect of {g|f:3a4eebf212974ba68d6867981c240b1b}blood phial{/g} in a 1-cell radius around that enemy, and her allies with the {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}bloodblessed{/g} effect receive +1 stack of {g|f:bd0b478bdb014d4c9d5b6af8ac877283}disturbed{/g} for 1 round. Kibellah's next successful attack will score a critical hit.

Whenever Kibellah kills an enemy, she automatically applies the effect of {g|f:3a4eebf212974ba68d6867981c240b1b}blood phial{/g} in a 1-cell radius around that enemy, and her allies with the {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}bloodblessed{/g} effect receive +1 stack of {g|f:bd0b478bdb014d4c9d5b6af8ac877283}disturbed{/g} for 1 round. Kibellah's next successful attack will score a critical hit.

languages.text: Cada vez que Kibellah mata a un enemigo, aplica automáticamente el efecto de {g|f:3a4eebf212974ba68d6867981c240b1b}Frasco de sangre{/g} en un radio de 1 casilla alrededor de él, y sus aliados con el efecto {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}Bendecidos por la sangre{/g} reciben +1 acumulación de {g|f:bd0b478bdb014d4c9d5b6af8ac877283}perturbado{/g} durante 1 asalto. El próximo impacto de Kibellah será un impacto crítico.
languages.original_text: Whenever Kibellah kills an enemy, she automatically applies the effect of {g|f:3a4eebf212974ba68d6867981c240b1b}blood phial{/g} in a 1-cell radius around that enemy, and her allies with the {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}bloodblessed{/g} effect receive +1 stack of {g|f:bd0b478bdb014d4c9d5b6af8ac877283}disturbed{/g} for 1 round. Kibellah's next successful attack will score a critical hit.

traits.locale_text: Cada vez que Kibellah mata a un enemigo, aplica automáticamente el efecto de {g|f:3a4eebf212974ba68d6867981c240b1b}Frasco de sangre{/g} en un radio de 1 casilla alrededor de él, y sus aliados con el efecto {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}Bendecidos por la sangre{/g} reciben +1 acumulación de {g|f:bd0b478bdb014d4c9d5b6af8ac877283}perturbado{/g} durante 1 asalto. El próximo impacto de Kibellah será un impacto crítico.

languages.text: キベラが敵を倒すたび、彼女はその敵の半径1セルに対して自動的に{g|f:3a4eebf212974ba68d6867981c240b1b}血の小瓶{/g}の効果を適用し、{g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}ブラッドブレスド{/g}効果を持つ彼女の味方は、1ラウンドの間、{g|f:bd0b478bdb014d4c9d5b6af8ac877283}動揺{/g}を+1スタック受け取る。キベラが次に攻撃に成功すると、クリティカルヒットになる。
languages.original_text: Whenever Kibellah kills an enemy, she automatically applies the effect of {g|f:3a4eebf212974ba68d6867981c240b1b}blood phial{/g} in a 1-cell radius around that enemy, and her allies with the {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}bloodblessed{/g} effect receive +1 stack of {g|f:bd0b478bdb014d4c9d5b6af8ac877283}disturbed{/g} for 1 round. Kibellah's next successful attack will score a critical hit.

traits.locale_text: キベラが敵を倒すたび、彼女はその敵の半径1セルに対して自動的に{g|f:3a4eebf212974ba68d6867981c240b1b}血の小瓶{/g}の効果を適用し、{g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}ブラッドブレスド{/g}効果を持つ彼女の味方は、1ラウンドの間、{g|f:bd0b478bdb014d4c9d5b6af8ac877283}動揺{/g}を+1スタック受け取る。キベラが次に攻撃に成功すると、クリティカルヒットになる。

languages.text: 每当绮贝菈杀死敌人时，都会对该名敌人周围1格内所有区域施加{g|f:3a4eebf212974ba68d6867981c240b1b}鲜血安瓿{/g}效果，但她所有拥有{g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}血佑{/g}效果的盟友也会获得1层{g|f:bd0b478bdb014d4c9d5b6af8ac877283}惊扰{/g}效果，持续一轮。击杀敌人后，绮贝菈下次命中时必定会造成暴击。
languages.original_text: Whenever Kibellah kills an enemy, she automatically applies the effect of {g|f:3a4eebf212974ba68d6867981c240b1b}blood phial{/g} in a 1-cell radius around that enemy, and her allies with the {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}bloodblessed{/g} effect receive +1 stack of {g|f:bd0b478bdb014d4c9d5b6af8ac877283}disturbed{/g} for 1 round. Kibellah's next successful attack will score a critical hit.

traits.locale_text: 每当绮贝菈杀死敌人时，都会对该名敌人周围1格内所有区域施加{g|f:3a4eebf212974ba68d6867981c240b1b}鲜血安瓿{/g}效果，但她所有拥有{g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}血佑{/g}效果的盟友也会获得1层{g|f:bd0b478bdb014d4c9d5b6af8ac877283}惊扰{/g}效果，持续一轮。击杀敌人后，绮贝菈下次命中时必定会造成暴击。

languages.text: Tötet Kibellah einen Gegner, bewirkt sie in einem Radius von 1 Zelle um den Gegner automatisch den Effekt {g|f:3a4eebf212974ba68d6867981c240b1b}Blutphiole{/g}. Mit dem {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}Blutsegen{/g}-Effekt belegte Verbündete erhalten 1 Runde lang +1 Stapel {g|f:bd0b478bdb014d4c9d5b6af8ac877283}Verstört{/g}. Kibellahs nächster erfolgreicher Angriff verursacht einen kritischen Treffer.
languages.original_text: Whenever Kibellah kills an enemy, she automatically applies the effect of {g|f:3a4eebf212974ba68d6867981c240b1b}blood phial{/g} in a 1-cell radius around that enemy, and her allies with the {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}bloodblessed{/g} effect receive +1 stack of {g|f:bd0b478bdb014d4c9d5b6af8ac877283}disturbed{/g} for 1 round. Kibellah's next successful attack will score a critical hit.

traits.locale_text: Tötet Kibellah einen Gegner, bewirkt sie in einem Radius von 1 Zelle um den Gegner automatisch den Effekt {g|f:3a4eebf212974ba68d6867981c240b1b}Blutphiole{/g}. Mit dem {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}Blutsegen{/g}-Effekt belegte Verbündete erhalten 1 Runde lang +1 Stapel {g|f:bd0b478bdb014d4c9d5b6af8ac877283}Verstört{/g}. Kibellahs nächster erfolgreicher Angriff verursacht einen kritischen Treffer.

languages.text: Chaque fois que Kibellah tue un ennemi, elle applique automatiquement l'effet {g|f:3a4eebf212974ba68d6867981c240b1b}Fiole de sang{/g} dans un rayon de 1 case autour de cet ennemi, et ses alliés sous l'effet {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}Béni par le sang{/g} reçoivent +1 cumul de {g|f:bd0b478bdb014d4c9d5b6af8ac877283}Perturbation{/g} pendant 1 round. La prochaine attaque réussie de Kibellah inflige un coup critique.
languages.original_text: Whenever Kibellah kills an enemy, she automatically applies the effect of {g|f:3a4eebf212974ba68d6867981c240b1b}blood phial{/g} in a 1-cell radius around that enemy, and her allies with the {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}bloodblessed{/g} effect receive +1 stack of {g|f:bd0b478bdb014d4c9d5b6af8ac877283}disturbed{/g} for 1 round. Kibellah's next successful attack will score a critical hit.

traits.locale_text: Chaque fois que Kibellah tue un ennemi, elle applique automatiquement l'effet {g|f:3a4eebf212974ba68d6867981c240b1b}Fiole de sang{/g} dans un rayon de 1 case autour de cet ennemi, et ses alliés sous l'effet {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}Béni par le sang{/g} reçoivent +1 cumul de {g|f:bd0b478bdb014d4c9d5b6af8ac877283}Perturbation{/g} pendant 1 round. La prochaine attaque réussie de Kibellah inflige un coup critique.

languages.text: Убивая противника, Кибелла автоматически применяет эффект {g|f:3a4eebf212974ba68d6867981c240b1b}кровавого фиала{/g} в радиусе 1 клетки вокруг него, а ее союзники с эффектом {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}багряное благословение{/g} получают +1 уровень {g|f:bd0b478bdb014d4c9d5b6af8ac877283}тревожности{/g} на 1 раунд. Следующая успешная атака Кибеллы будет критической.
languages.original_text: Whenever Kibellah kills an enemy, she automatically applies the effect of {g|f:3a4eebf212974ba68d6867981c240b1b}blood phial{/g} in a 1-cell radius around that enemy, and her allies with the {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}bloodblessed{/g} effect receive +1 stack of {g|f:bd0b478bdb014d4c9d5b6af8ac877283}disturbed{/g} for 1 round. Kibellah's next successful attack will score a critical hit.

traits.locale_text: Убивая противника, Кибелла автоматически применяет эффект {g|f:3a4eebf212974ba68d6867981c240b1b}кровавого фиала{/g} в радиусе 1 клетки вокруг него, а ее союзники с эффектом {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}багряное благословение{/g} получают +1 уровень {g|f:bd0b478bdb014d4c9d5b6af8ac877283}тревожности{/g} на 1 раунд. Следующая успешная атака Кибеллы будет критической.

Убивая противника, Кибелла автоматически применяет эффект {g|f:3a4eebf212974ba68d6867981c240b1b}кровавого фиала{/g} в радиусе 1 клетки вокруг него, а ее союзники с эффектом {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}багряное благословение{/g} получают +1 уровень {g|f:bd0b478bdb014d4c9d5b6af8ac877283}тревожности{/g} на 1 раунд. Следующая успешная атака Кибеллы будет критической.

languages.text: Kibellah, bir düşmanı öldürdüğünde o düşmanın çevresindeki 1 hücrelik yarıçap içinde {g|f:3a4eebf212974ba68d6867981c240b1b}kan tüpü{/g} etkisini uygular ve {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}kanla vaftiz{/g} etkisine sahip dost birimleri, 1 rauntluğuna +1 {g|f:bd0b478bdb014d4c9d5b6af8ac877283}kaygı{/g} birikimi elde eder. Kibellah'nın bir sonraki başarılı saldırısı, kritik vuruş yapar.
languages.original_text: Whenever Kibellah kills an enemy, she automatically applies the effect of {g|f:3a4eebf212974ba68d6867981c240b1b}blood phial{/g} in a 1-cell radius around that enemy, and her allies with the {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}bloodblessed{/g} effect receive +1 stack of {g|f:bd0b478bdb014d4c9d5b6af8ac877283}disturbed{/g} for 1 round. Kibellah's next successful attack will score a critical hit.
